resources.string: Hello! My name is Lucas Müller, My interest in web development started back in 2011 when I decided to try editing custom Blogger themes — turns out i got really interested in website development and that taught me a lot about HTML and CSS!
Currently i\'m a Computer Science student at Universidade Católica De Pernambuco (UNICAP), Located in Pernambuco State, Brazil.

ClimaEmCasa is a project developed by three students for the Web and Mobile Programming course at Universidade Católica De Pernambuco. The project was intended to be done in a simple way and with a nice look, using at least one Rest API.
